reviewText: I ordered this film after seeing 'A Broken Life' because it was shot in a single day. Although it's a 'no budget' indie, the fact that they could shoot a film in one day kept my attention while I tried to figure out how this was done. I didn't know the two leads (Grace Kosaka, Diego Klattenhoff) but I did recognize Jefferson Mappin from Unforgiven. The theme was interesting, a bit slow moving but overall glad I saw it.
